resources.string: A large dog with a silky coat that ranges from ivory to reddish, the golden retriever is instantly recognizable. His floppy ears and soft eyes frame a dark nose. This breed was originally bred to help duck hunters bring ducks back to the boat. To this day, these dogs are generally friendly with strangers and even-tempered with change. They tend to love water and fetch, qualities that come together to make them into the quintessential American dog.
